pr_title: [lgwebos] Updated Readme for removed action getApplications.

timeline.message:
Updated Readme for removed action getApplications.
Signed-off-by: Sebastian Prehn <sebastian.prehn@gmx.de>

timeline.bodyText: Please forget smarthome prefix, it is not required and I imagine this is something that should change in OH3.
timeline.author: lolodomo
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -300,7 +282,7 @@ Parameters:
 
 | Name    | Description                                                                   |
 |---------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
-| appId   | The Application ID. getApplications provides available apps and their appIds. |
+| appId   | The Application ID. Console command smarthome:lgwebos <thingUID> applications provides available apps and their appIds. |

timeline.message:
Removed smarthome prefix in Readme.
Signed-off-by: Sebastian Prehn <sebastian.prehn@gmx.de>
